Temporarily modify regex rules based on calendar events.

Use case:
  A shift worker works the day shift for two days, then the night shift for the next two.
  Some rules need to be disabled or enabled during the varying working hours.

This will create both a regex rule and a workflow, the rule will be enabled on the fly during the specific calendar event.
This should match the calendar event, which can be created in the Calendar app.

Temporarily modify regex rules based on calendar events, changes are applied temporarily without altering the configuration.

Such a workflow will be automatically triggered by an incoming call.

Check the workflow preset for the use case and a typical setup.

This will be automatically triggered on incoming SMS messages before they are screened.

This action must be the first one in the workflow.

This can be chained with other actions like Find Rules and Modify Rules.
- If the SMS number and content match, the workflow will keep executing.
- Otherwise, the workflow will terminate.
